main.name: Ly Quoc Thang
main.description: I have more than 1 year of experience in the same position
main.bio: My name is Ly Quoc Thang and I am the Web Developer of Archisketch Vietnam. I'm a Front-end developer (ReactJs, NextJs) and with over 1 year of experience, I enjoy using my skills to contribute to the exciting technological advancements that happen every day at Archisketch Vietnam. I graduated from Faculty of Information Technology at College of Information Technology - Da Nang University in 2019 with Bachelor Degree in Software Development. When I was in school, I earned a scientific research certification for a project to build a commercial website.
main.contactmessage: Glad you've read this far. Contact me via Facebook, Zalo or the form below.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
